The important thing for building this bridge
is Arbitrum allows sort of arbitrary message
passing between layers.

I'm just going to leave the Twitter there for a bit,

contract directly to layer two.
I shouldn't say directly, maybe sort of asynchronously,

is basically we're sort of going from L1.
